SELECT dgc.id, dgc.user_id, dgc.app_service_id, dgc.ref, dgc.commit_date, dgc.commit_sha, dgc.commit_content, dgc.url, da.`name` appServiceName FROM devops_gitlab_commit dgc JOIN devops_app_service da ON dgc.app_service_id = da.id WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId}
AND dgc.app_service_id IN
#{appServiceId}
AND da.is_active = 1 AND dgc.app_service_id = da.id
AND dgc.commit_date >= CONCAT('', '${startDate}', ' 00:00:00')
AND dgc.commit_date <= CONCAT('', '${endDate}', ' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY dgc.commit_date DESC

SELECT dgc.id, dgc.user_id, dgc.app_service_id, dgc.ref, dgc.commit_date, dgc.commit_sha, dgc.commit_content, dgc.url FROM devops_gitlab_commit dgc WHERE dgc.app_service_id = #{appServiceId} AND dgc.ref = #{branchName}
AND dgc.commit_date >= CONCAT('', '${startDate}', ' 00:00:00')
